CrazyChess.logic

Class MainLogic

  • java.lang.Object
    • CrazyChess.logic.MainLogic

  • public class MainLogic
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the main class for the chess game logic. Ties everything to do with logic together.
    Author:
    Darius

    • Constructor Detail

      • MainLogic

        public MainLogic()
        Constructor for the MainLogic class. Initiates the gamestate as an empty board. Initiates currentTurn with "white" Initiates turnNo with 1

      • isDebug

        public boolean isDebug()
        Getter for debug mode.
        Returns:
        true if debug mode is on, false if not

      • getCheckStatus

        public boolean getCheckStatus(java.lang.String color)
        Method used to see if a player of specified color in currently under check
        Parameters:
        color - color of the player to check
        Returns:
        true if the specified player is in check, false if not

        Method used to see if a player of specified color in currently mated
        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • getGamestate

        public AbstractPiece[][] getGamestate()
        Returns the current game state
        Returns:
        current game state

      • changeTurn

        public void changeTurn()
        Changes the turn to the opposite of what it currently is. If for some reason the turn is neither Black nor White by default the method sets it to white

      • resetBoard

        public void resetBoard()
        Places all pieces in proper starting position

      • moveTo

        public boolean moveTo(AbstractPiece p,
                      int x,
                      int y)
        Attempts to move a piece to the set parameters. Returns true if success.
        Parameters:
        p - the piece selected to be moved
        x - x position to attempt to move to
        y - y position to attempt to move to
        Returns:
        true if move was successful, false if not

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        The piece in the specified position
